with KeyboardKit
specific functionality.

inlineContent.text: When you use KeyboardKit, simply inherit this class instead
to extend your controller with a
set of additional lifecycle functions, properties, services
Your controller can then override any functions and replace
any services to customize the behavior of the keyboard. You
can also access any observable state as environment objects,
since they are injected into the view hiearchy.
You may notice that KeyboardKit uses initializer parameters
instead of environment objects. Itâ€™s intentional, to better
communicate the dependencies of each view.

This protocol is used to make using the keyboard input view
controller more abstract and available to more platforms.
This is a namespace for various keyboard-related types.

This protocol can be implemented by any type that can check

This protocol can be used to specify behavior rules for the
keyboard. It aims to separate behavior from action handling
to make the code cleaner and more understandable.
